Property Detail

availableOpsByType

def availableOpsByType
This map contains available filter operations by type. It is used when creating the individual rows in the filter pane. The values in the text maps are key suffixes for the resource bundle. The prefix used in the valueMessagePrefix attribute will be fp.op.

currentCriteria

def currentCriteria

filterButton

def filterButton
Creates a link (button) that displays the filter pane when pressed. The title attribute may be used to modify the text on the button. If omitted, the text will be "Filter". The filterPaneId attribute may be specified if the associated filterPane tag has an id attribute. Their values must be the same.

filterPane

def filterPane
This tag generates the filter pane itself. As of release 0.4, this tag pulls as much filtering information from the domain class as possible by default. All attributes from 0.3.1 are still supported, but are considered deprecated in favor of more sensible alternatives. TODO: Document attributes.

filterPaneIncludes

def filterPaneIncludes
This tag generates necessary style and script includes. Use this tag in the head element of your pages. There are no attributes for this tag.
deprecated:
Use the "includes" tag instead, as it is more DRY.

includes

def includes
This tag generates necessary style and script includes. Use this tag in the head element of your pages. There are no attributes for this tag.
since:
0.4

isFiltered

def isFiltered

isNotFiltered

def isNotFiltered

namespace

static def namespace

paginate

def paginate
Grails pagination tag wrapper for use with the filterpane plugin. attribute total - a custom count to be used in pagination attribute domainBean - the domain bean being filtered. Ignored if total is specified.

filterPaneLegacy

private def filterPaneLegacy(def attrs, def body)
Creates a div that can be shown that contains a filter (search) form. Parameters
AttributeRequiredDescription
filterBeanYesThe model class to extract filter properties from.
filterPropertiesYesA list of filterBean's properties to include on the form.
filterPaneIdThe ID attribute for the container div. Defaults to 'filterPane'
filterPaneStyleThe style attribute for the container div.
filterPaneClassThe style class for the container div.
filterPaneTitleThe H2 (header) text for the form. Defaults to 'Filter Settings'
filterFormNameThe name attribute for the filter form. Defaults to 'filterForm'
deprecated:
Consider using the filterPane tag instead.
